Title: Relates to revocation or suspension of a license to carry or possess a firearm
Summary: Provides that a license to carry or possess a firearm shall be revoked or suspended where a temporary order of protection or an order of protection has been issued, or a temporary order of protection or an order of protection has been willfully violated.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to revocation or suspension of a license to carry or possess a firearm
